title: 'Nico & the Niners' Korean based OCE Club
body:
Hi, I'm Suda Kim and I started a club called 'Nico & the Niners' after a TØP song. 
I'm Korean and I want some Korean friends in oce which is rare ;-;
If u like Korean that's fine too
I like everyone
LoL user : @Meyovir
I want a discord server as well
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

replies.body: 1 year since but this still open?
I'm not a Korean but I'm a huge fan of TOP :P

yessss that is fine
Do you want to join??
